title:
Thia past Saturday morning, there were about fifteen cars and a motorcycle along the side of 17-74-76 on the causeway before the first Leland exit.  It appeared that they had been there for awhile, as the windshields were wet with dew.  Later in the day they had been removed.  What was that all about?  



Thanks!  Roger
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6362
